title: Greek Island Luxury: Archipelagos Hotel
description: Escape to an exclusive boutique retreat on the beautiful Greek Island of Mykonos. Stay at the award-winning, five-star Archipelagos Hotel - declared one of the best hotels in the world by Conde Nast Traveler - for four nights, with daily buffet breakfasts, one sunset cocktail each, a welcome drink each on arrival, discounts on spa treatments, a complimentary bottle of wine with a treat from the chef and more for two adults.
offer_address: PO Box 1024 Kalo Livadi, Mykonos 846 00, Greece

title: Seaside Luxury: Porto Elounda Golf & Spa Resort, Crete
description: Ancient Greece meets contemporary luxury at the five-star Porto Elounda Golf & Spa Resort in Creteâ€™s beautiful Elounda region. Enjoy five nights in a Porto Seaview Room with daily buffet breakfasts, nightly buffet dinners or dinner credits, one three-course lunch, a welcome drink each and more for two adults.
